definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Their drug of choice was a potent intoxicant they called hashish.
sentences.chinese: 他们选择的是一种他们称为“黑煞”的烈性麻醉剂。

sentences.english: Jackson regularly received the anaesthetic propofol to go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊会定期服用麻醉剂异丙酚帮助睡眠。

sentences.english: Hobit is the chloroform of love.
They claim Murray administered a fatal dose of propofol and other sedatives.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称莫里给了杰克逊一剂致命的麻醉剂和镇静剂。

sentences.english: One of these was pain, operations had to be done without anaesthetics .
sentences.chinese: 一个原因是疼痛，做手术没有麻醉剂。

sentences.english: Corina's lips move as she tries to answer through the clearing fog of anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉剂的迷雾逐渐散去，科瑞娜努力动了动嘴唇。

sentences.english: Egotism is the anesthetic that dulls the pain of stupidity.
sentences.chinese: 自负是为了麻痹因为愚蠢带来痛楚的麻醉剂。

sentences.english: Sevoflurane caused less airway irritation than other inhaled anesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 七氟醚对呼吸道的刺激性明显低于其他吸入麻醉剂。

sentences.english: He doctored the wine with a stupefying dose.
He was pretty goofed up that night.
sentences.chinese: 那晚他服用麻醉剂后被搞得昏昏沉沉。

sentences.english: Operations were difficult in the 18th century . In those days there were no anaesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 在18世纪动手术是很困难的，那时没有麻醉剂。

sentences.english: Their use therefore requires either pain-killing medications anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 因而它们的使用需要止痛剂或麻醉剂。

sentences.english: In short, Buddhism is the new opium of the people.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，佛教是西方人生活中，新的麻醉剂。

sentences.english: Acetylene is a simple asphyxiant and anesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 乙炔是简单的窒息物和麻醉剂。

sentences.english: His recent affair is with Katrina Kaif.
sentences.chinese: 他最近的事件是与卡特里娜麻醉剂。
